text: Bonifels is a historic home located at Ridgway Township in Elk County, Pennsylvania. It was built in 1898 by N.T. Arnold and is a large -story, "T" shaped stone mansion. It features hipped roofs with hipped roofed dormers, a conical tower, and a crenellated stone tower. It is owned by the Elk County Country Club. Note: This includes and It was added to the National Register of Historic Places in 1978. ==References== Category:Houses on the National Register of Historic Places in Pennsylvania Category:Houses completed in 1898 Category:Houses in Elk County, Pennsylvania Category:National Register of Historic Places in Elk County, Pennsylvania
title: Bonifels
